General.Name: Aurora Innovation Inc
General.Description: Aurora Innovation, Inc. operates as a self-driving technology company in the United States. It focuses on developing Aurora Driver, a platform that brings a suite of self-driving hardware, software, and data services together to adapt and interoperate various vehicle types and applications. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 1654 Smallman Street, Pittsburgh, PA, United States, 15222
